PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ProjectOrderPurchaseOrder
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Defines the requirements for purchase orders in a project.

PropertyDef.Name: IsFOB
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of whether contents of the purchase order are delivered 'Free on Board' (= True) or not (= False).

PropertyDef.Name: ShipMethod
PropertyDef.Definition: Method of shipping that will be used for goods or services.
